BadgeDetail.Name: Electrical I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner understands the fundamentals of the electrical systems. They can inspect bulbs, wipers and fuses; replace bulbs and fuses and make a soldered joint.

Task.Title: Lights, wipes and fuses
Task.Body: Upload evidence inspecting head and tail light bulbs, wipers and fuses.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence inspecting head and tail light bulbs, wipers and fuses.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence inspecting head and tail light bulbs, wipers and fuses.

Task.Title: Soldering
Task.Body: Upload evidence replacing head and tail bulbs and making a soldered joint.

Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence replacing head and tail bulbs and making a soldered joint.
